Although they spend most of their time hunting and battling [demons](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=28) for control of the [Abyss](/Planes.aspx?ID=13), thulgants amuse themselves with a variety of diversions, such as maintaining galleries of petrified mortals or building massive, hive-like lairs filled with enslaved minions. Each of these qlippoth is a horrific tangle of limbs, with spiderlike legs, writhing tentacles emerging from the top of its head, and three scorpion-like stingers. **[Recall Knowledge - Fiend](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 40 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 38 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 35 [Thulgant](/Monsters.aspx?ID=777) **Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 217 2.0 **Perception** +30; [greater darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [_true seeing_](/Spells.aspx?ID=344) **Languages** [Abyssal](/Languages.aspx?ID=12); [telepathy 100 feet](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=37) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +32, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +35, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +33, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +32 **Str** +9 **Dex** +6 **Con** +6 **Int** +5 **Wis** +6 **Cha** +9 --- **AC** 42 **Fort** +30 **Ref** +28 **Will** +32 **HP** 305 ( [fast healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=15) 10) **Immunities** [controlled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=6), [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68) **Resistances** mental 15, physical 15 (except cold iron) **Weaknesses** lawful 15 --- **Speed** 30 feet, climb 30 feet, fly 50 feet; [_freedom of movement_](/Spells.aspx?ID=128) **Melee** stinger +35 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 3d12+17 piercing plus 3d6 mental, 1d6 chaotic, and thulgant venom **Melee** tentacle +35 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 3d8+17 bludgeoning plus 2d6 acid, 1d6 chaotic, and [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18) **Occult Innate Spells** DC 40 - **Cantrips (9th)** [Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66) - **7th** [Plane Shift](/Spells.aspx?ID=222) - **8th** [Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [Divine Aura](/Spells.aspx?ID=81) (chaotic only), [Divine Decree](/Spells.aspx?ID=82) (chaotic only), [Phantom Pain](/Spells.aspx?ID=220) (×3) - **9th** [Flesh to Stone](/Spells.aspx?ID=123) (×3), [Phantasmal Calamity](/Spells.aspx?ID=218) - **Constant (4th)** [Freedom of Movement](/Spells.aspx?ID=128) - **Constant (6th)** [True Seeing](/Spells.aspx?ID=344) **Rituals** DC 40 - **9th** [Imprisonment](/Rituals.aspx?ID=13) **Demon Hunter** ([Divination](/Traits.aspx?ID=47), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120)) The thulgant causes a [demon](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=28) within 30 feet to suffer the effect of its sinful vulnerability. **[Greater Constrict](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=19)** 2d6+17 bludgeoning and 1d6 acid, DC 40 **Mind-Rending Sting** **Requirement** The thulgant hits the same enemy with two consecutive sting Strikes in the same round; **Effect** The thulgant deals 3d12+17 mental damage to the enemy. If the enemy is affected by thulgant venom, that poison gains the [virulent](/Traits.aspx?ID=162) trait. **Stunning Display** ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [Enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [Fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68), [Incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120), [Visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=163)) The thulgant rises up on its twitching limbs and presents its numerous tentacles and stingers in a horrifying display of awfulness. Creatures in a 30-foot emanation must attempt a DC 40 Will save, after which they are temporarily immune to further Stunning Displays for 1 minute.
**Critical Success** The creature is unaffected.
**Success** The creature is [stunned 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=36).
**Failure** The creature is stunned 4.
**Critical Failure** The creature is stunned 8. **Thulgant Venom** ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Saving Throw** Fortitude DC 40; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 3d6 poison damage and the victim gains one of the following at random: [clumsy 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3), [enfeebled 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13), or [stupefied 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37) (1 round); **Stage 2** 6d6 poison damage and the victim gains two of the following at random: clumsy 2, enfeebled 2, or stupefied 2 (1 round); **Stage 3** 9d6 poison damage and the victim gains all three of the following: clumsy 3, enfeebled 3, and stupefied 3 (1 round)
